response.overview: Two young men meet, gradually growing ever more intimate, a crackling erotic tension is in the air. They do not come across as inexperienced or shy, and they both seem thoroughly aware of their mutual desire. Despite their self-assuredness, their first advances take the form of lightly tender caresses and penetrating gazes, a cautious courtship and teasing. Their inquisitively sensuous lips briefly find each other before moving on to discover their bodies, the coveted other that Theo and Martin are just beginning to explore.  They let their encounter take its own time as they fall into talking, dancing, and laughing. Their eyes dance, at times flirting mischievously, at others erotically gleaming. Their gazes draw them together, tenderly gliding over one another's bodies. The two men are having fun with and through each other as they slowly begin to merge.
response.title: Theo & Martin
